subject: New TopCoder(R) Studio contest posted
body:
Hello sm1lies,

Will your design brand the TCCC this year?

Once again, we're featuring an exciting competition for members to create a tournament logo.  A total of $5,000 will be awarded to the top five designers, with the grand prize winner earning $3,000! 

All members have the opportunity to put their originality to the test and design a logo that will be used as the base to brand the 2007 TopCoder Collegiate Challenge. That includes our website, t-shirts, program, the stage at the onsite finals, and anywhere else that the TCCC07 logo might be noticed. 

This contest begins at 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (UTC/GMT -4) on Tuesday, July 3, 2007.  The submission deadline for this contest is 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (UTC/GMT -4) on Tuesday, July 10, 2007.

The contest will award cash prizes totaling $5,000.00 to up to five (5) competitors. 

For all of the contest details, check out http://studio.topcoder.com/?module=ViewActiveContests
 
Best of luck to you at the Studio! 


- The TopCoder Studio Team 


===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of TopCoder Studio and/or Graphic Design competitions.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, log in to TopCoder or TopCoder Studio and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.


http://studio.topcoder.com

Glastonbury, CT 06033
